Title: A decade of code comment quality assessment: A systematic literature review
Inclusion / Exclusion criteria:
Inclusion criteria:

- IC1: The topic of the paper is about code comment quality.
- IC2: The study presents a model/technique/approach to assess code comments or software documentation including code comments.

Exclusion criteria:
- EC1: he paper is not in english.
- EC2: It does not assess any form of quality aspects of comments e.g., content, style, or language used.
- EC3: It is not published in a technical track.
- EC4: It is a survey paper.
- EC5: It is not a peer reviewed paper, or it is a pre-print.
- EC6: It covers other documentation artifacts, i.e., not comments.
- EC7: It is shorter than 5 pages.
Prompt instruction: The paper is included, if all inclusion criteria match. If the paper matches any exclusion criteria, it is excluded.
